abstract: U.S. investment-grade debt issuance swelled to its highest weekly total since May 2008, Thomson Reuters data shows.
snippet: U.S. investment-grade debt issuance swelled to its highest weekly total since May 2008, Thomson Reuters data shows.
lead_paragraph: Big bond offerings from Hewlett-Packard and Home Depot swelled U.S.investment-grade debt issuance to its highest weekly total since May 2008, Thomson Reuters data shows.
